# HDU Forum Project - Java Spring Boot

## Project Overview
A forum system with user management, post/comment system, categories. Using Spring Boot, MySQL, Redis.

## Technology Stack
- Backend: Java 17, Spring Boot 3.x
- Database: MySQL 8.0
- Cache: Redis
- ORM: MyBatis
- Build Tool: Maven

## Project Structure
```
src/main/java/com/hdu/forum
├── controller     # REST API controllers
├── service        # Business logic
├── mapper         # MyBatis mappers
├── entity         # Database entities
├── dto            # Data transfer objects
├── config         # Configuration classes
└── util           # Utility classes
```

## Status: In Progress
- [x] Create project structure
- [ ] Configure application
- [ ] Implement business logic
- [ ] Test and deploy
